channel.title: Half-Elf Versatility?
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Half-Elf Versatility?" - "Half-Elf Versatility" feature source incorrectly marked - if it exists at all?

item.title: Re: Half-Elf Versatility?
item.content:encoded: Ahh yep there it is, that makes sense, thank you very much!

item.title: Re: Half-Elf Versatility?
item.content:encoded: The Half-Elf Versatility is an optional rule included in the Sword Coast Adventurer's Guide. The page has been edited for clarity.

item.title: Half-Elf Versatility?
item.content:encoded: On the half-elf page it says they have a feature called "Half-Elf Versatility" and the only source marked is the standard PHB, but the PHB only has the standard Skill Versatility (gain two skill proficiencies) - in fact, this page is the only place I've been able to find with that racial feature. Has the source just not been marked yet?
